definition: mutual interaction, reverse (a direction, attitude, or course of action)
details:
noun
- mutual interaction
= synonyms: reciprocation, give-and-take
- reciprocal transfer of equivalent sums of money, especially the currencies of different countries
= example: reciprocal transfer of equivalent sums of money, especially the currencies of different countries
= synonyms: exchange
- the act of changing one thing for another thing
= synonyms: exchange
- a junction of highways on different levels that permits traffic to move from one to another without crossing traffic streams
verb
- reverse (a direction, attitude, or course of action)
= synonyms: switch, tack, flip-flop, flip
- cause to change places
= example: cause to change places
= synonyms: transpose
- give to, and receive from, one another
= synonyms: exchange, change
- put in the place of another
= synonyms: substitute, exchange, replace
